title: A commentary vpon the Epistles of Saint Paul to Philemon, and to the Hebrewes together with a compendious explication of the second and third Epistles of Saint Iohn. By VVilliam Iones of East Bergholt in Suffolke, Dr. in Divinity, and sometimes one of the fellowes of the foundation of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge.
author: Jones, William, 1561-1636.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R[ichard] B[adger] for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-Yard, at the signe of the Blacke Beare,
